backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the replacement of the hero section logo with 'Fish Edit.png' in the Home page component, with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and configuration files for the Benning Bass Club website.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining OKLCH color system for light and dark modes, including background, foreground, primary, secondary, and other UI colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with basic meta tags, title 'Benning Bass Club', and script tag loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component configuring TanStack Router with 8 routes (home, join, schedule, gallery, info, links, about, contact) wrapped in a Layout component with Navigation and Footer.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Three-column footer component displaying club info, quick links, social media, sponsor mention, copyright with dynamic year, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Lightbox.tsx: Modal lightbox component for viewing full-size images with navigation arrows, close button, keyboard controls (Escape, arrow keys), and image counter.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky header navigation with desktop centered menu and mobile hamburger menu, featuring links to main pages, external merchandise/Facebook links, and prominent Join button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, using React Query for caching and automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useImagePreloader.ts: Custom hook that preloads three home page images (two flags and main logo) on first load, caching them in memory and tracking loading status to prevent re-preloading.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom earth-tone color scheme (forest green, sand, water blue) for light and dark modes, themed for a fishing/outdoor aesthetic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: About page displaying the Benning Bass Club's story, mission, values, and member information using card-based layout with icons.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page showing email, social media links (Facebook/Instagram), and club leadership information in a card-based layout.
frontend/src/pages/Gallery.tsx: Photo gallery page with masonry grid layout displaying fishing photos and a lightbox component for full-screen image viewing with navigation.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Homepage featuring hero section with club logo, flag motifs, CTA buttons for joining/schedule/gallery, and an about section with image preloading support.
frontend/src/pages/Info.tsx: Information hub page displaying club meeting schedules, rules/guidelines, and membership information in card layouts with icons. Uses shadcn/ui Card components and lucide-react icons for visual presentation.
frontend/src/pages/Join.tsx: Membership interest form page with controlled form inputs for name, email, phone, experience, and message fields. Handles form submission with basic validation and displays success alert.
frontend/src/pages/Links.tsx: Resource links page organizing external fishing-related links into four categories: regulations, local lakes, bass fishing resources, and local services. Each category is displayed in a Card with external link icons.
frontend/src/pages/Merchandise.tsx: Empty merchandise page component with no content implemented.
frontend/src/pages/Schedule.tsx: Tournament schedule page displaying 2025-2026 tournament dates, lakes, ramps, and draw dates in a responsive table (desktop) and card layout (mobile). Contains hardcoded schedule data array.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, Inter font family, custom border radius variables, and animation keyframes. Includes typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking one existing feature to replace the hero section logo with 'Fish Edit.png' image. Contains schema version, architectural notes, and feature tracking structure.
